text: Doctor Zhao and all of her staffs are super friendly and nice. They are attentive and they greet all patients enthusiastically. They are very caring and I felt at ease and warmth to be taken care by the team. Thank you

I can’t say enough good things about the incredible doctor and staff at this clinic, showing genuine compassion and kindness in every interaction. The doctor( Ms Zhao), is thorough, attentive, and truly listens, making you feel valued and understood. The staff are equally supportive, always willing to help with a smile and take extra steps to ensure comfort and convenience.

Friendly staff and doctor are also amazing. They are patient and very detailed with the consultation. I am also thankful for the staff that are able to helped me out with my helper's medical. They are very flexible and understand our needs of urgency. I really appreciate the staff and doctors there. Thank you so much!

Dr Zhao has been my family’s go-to doctor ever since we became a Bt Batok resident years ago… she is thorough, friendly, assuring and professional… we feel we are in good hands under her care… Dr Zhao’s clinic assistants Filzah and team are also courteous, friendly, helpful & efficient… have never seen any other clinic managing patients’ expectations on wait time better than them… the clinic visit experience was so smooth, it already contributed much in making each already sick patient feel better after the visit..kudos to the team… will miss distinct clinic’s care even after moving out of bt batok… & will still likely come back to visit should I require medical attention in the future…thank you from the bottom of our hearts :)

Dr. Zhao Jing is the best GP doctor I have ever met. I never wrote any review before, but this time I am writing to express my deepest gratitude for the exceptional care and compassion that Dr. Zhao has shown me during my recent visit. Her expertise, dedication, and attention to detail have been instrumental in my recovery, and I feel incredibly fortunate to have been under her care. Her commitment to her patients is truly inspiring, and I am sincerely thankful for all that she has done for me.
Strongly recommended to my friends!!
